name: Towerofhanoi
body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
	<meta charset="utf-8">
	<title>TowerOfHanoi</title>
	<script src="http://a.tbcdn.cn/s/kissy/1.3.0/kissy-min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
	var pageConf = {
		num : 3
	};
	KISSY.getScript('iio/core/iioEngine.js',{success:function(){
		var script;
		if(KISSY.UA.mobile){
			script = 'iio/hanoi.mobile.js';
		}else{
			script = 'iio/hanoi.js';
		}
		KISSY.getScript(script,{success:function(){
			var num = prompt("几层？","3");
			if(!isNaN(num)){
				pageConf.num = num;
			}
			iio.start(hanoi);
		}});	
	}});
	function win(){
		window.location.reload();
	}
	</script>
</head>
<body>
	
</body>
</html>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
